channel.title: SW-OP-Depthwise-conv on Memo
channel.description: Recent content in SW-OP-Depthwise-conv on Memo

item.description: Traditional CONV 舉個例子 input = [224,224,3,1] RGB的圖 output = [224,224,10,1] 變成有10個channel 這樣的話kernel 可以是[5,5,3,10] 如下圖(1), input channel 一定要等於 kernel channel 如下圖(2), kernel個數 一定要等於 output channel 如下圖(3), output每個點的計算等於 input channel 和對應的 filter channel做計算再加起來 以範例來看就是 input channel 1 <=> kernel 1 + input channel 2 <=> kernel 2 + input channel 3 <=> kernel 3 W_in = 224 H_in = 224 Nch = 3 k = 5 Nk = 10 可以這樣想,output = [224,224,10,1]
